title: Coverlet (USA), 1820–60
medium:
Medium: wool, cotton
Technique: double cloth
description: Large complete coverlet in navy blue wool and white cotton with two central wreaths enclosing an eight-pointed star. Surrounding these are an array of floral and bird motifs including eagles with wings spread and clutching banners, scrolling acanthus leaves, a small building with cupola, and pairs of reindeer. Date on coverlet appears to read 1822.

tombstone.epitaph:
Coverlet (USA), 1820–60. Medium: wool, cotton
